Description: 2017 Ernie Ball MusicMan USA John Petrucci Majesty in Glacial WhiteThe Majesty is the result of John’s unwavering demand for performance, playability and race inspired design. One of the most ergonomic and perfectly balanced instruments available, the Majesty features neck through body design, unparalleled upper and lower fret access, economical in-line control knob placement and new digital pickup switching capabilities which effectively eliminates delay between pickup selection. The Majesty is the exemplification of everything we know a John Petrucci signature model to be - innovative technology, versatile performance, and a sleek modern feel. Includes hardshell case."The Majesty guitar symbolizes the very reason why I am so proud to be a Music Man artist. I had the idea for this guitar a couple of years ago but it is because of their innovative spirit and dedication to the art of guitar building that it is now a reality. I am so grateful that I am able to collaborate with the best guitar company on the planet and so incredibly proud that together we have created what is to me, the perfect musical instrument for guitar players. I really hope you get a chance to play one and am confident that you will feel the same!" - John Petrucci Body shape: Double cutaway Body type: Solid body Orientation: Right handed Neck shape: Petrucci Neck wood: Mahogany Joint: Neck-through Scale length: 25.5 in. Truss rod: Standard Neck finish: Gloss Fretboard Material: Ebony Radius: 17 in. Fret size: Medium jumbo Number of frets: 24 Inlays: JP Shield Nut width: 1.69 in. (43 mm) Pickups Configuration: HH Neck: Sonic Ecstasy Bridge: Sonic Ecstasy Brand: DiMarzio Active or passive pickups: Passive Series or parallel: Series Piezo: Yes Active EQ: Yes Special electronics: Push/push volume boost Controls Control layout: Master volume, tone, piezo volume Pickup switch: 3-way, and 3-way (piezo/magnetic) Coil tap or split: Coil split Bridge type: Tremolo/Vibrato Bridge design: Piezo floating tremolo Tailpiece: Not applicable Tuning machines: Schaller locking Color: Chrome Other Number of strings: 6-string Special features: Signature model, Electronics Case: Hardshell case Accessories: None Country of origin: United States This guitar has barely been used and is in very good condition. There are very little signs of wear anywhere. She plays like a dream and sounds amazing! One thing you may not know -- the case was designed so that you can leave the tremolo arm ON the guitar while the case is closed -- what a great feature!
